title: Viagra logo sans serif
content:
Hello

Can anyone help me with the Viagra logo typeface?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121101035536im_/http:/typophile.com/files/viagra_logo_4963.jpg)

Thanks

Clinton
author: cisfor

comments.content: May I ask about the purpose of your request?
Akzidenz Grotesk Extended + some manual stretching will get you close.

<cite>May I ask about the purpose of your request?</cite>

You'll find it in your inbox in a couple of weeks time ;-)
hehe - I'm a student and I have to make a guerilla ad campaign. My idea involves viagra and a "do not disturb" sign that points upwards instead of hanging downwards...
